name: Plan Beta: School Escape
description:
You have to find an exit from school at every level. You must not get caught by teachers or security. To do this, you will have to show your intelligence and quick reactions. Look for the ways out, use improvised objects such as empty cans or similar things, and most importantly.
Have fun.

(Playing on PC is more combortable then Android)

This game was created by AngryRectangle for Mini Jam. Music by BLKKDOUT.
